Name: It's a Food Truck Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on an It's a Food Truck mount that can double-jump to travel very fast.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on a It's a Food Truck Mount that enables double-jump to travel very fast. Double-click your destination on the World Map and you will automatically fly toward it along the navigation route. (Auto flight is only available on certain continents, including Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Mount-permitted continents by buying Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on an It's a Food Truck mount that can double-jump to travel very fast.
